sourceMeaningMnemonic: You're in a <radical>cage</radical> and you've been shot by an <radical>arrow</radical>. Obviously things are looking pretty bad. You need some <kanji>medicine</kanji> if you hope to live.
meaningInfo: More specifically, antibiotics. Your wound is festering pretty badly.
readingMnemonic:
When we need to remember the sound <ja>い</ja> we use the word "Eagle."

You need your <kanji>medicine</kanji> really bad. Then, you look up. There's an <reading>ea</reading>gle (<ja>い</ja>) flying overhead. He has a package. It's medicine! You're saved!
readingInfo: Or, so you think. He just keeps circling and circling. Feel some hate for the eagle. Why isn't he dropping the medicine? You don't have long to live!
